Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near O'Hare
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near O'Hare due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near O'Hare due to signal problems.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute near Damen/Grand
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses temp. rrtd. SB: Damen, Chicago, Western, Warren, & Damen. NB: Damen, Washington, Western, Chicago, & Damen due to construction nr Damen/Grand.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Damen/Grand due to construction.

  • Southbound buses will operate via Damen, Chicago, Western, Warren, and Damen.
  • Northbound buses will operate via Damen, Washington, Western, Chicago, and Damen.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/Chicago
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Chicago, Laramie, Madison, and Cicero due to, street blockage at Cicero/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Chicago, Laramie, Madison, and Cicero due to, street blockage at Cicero/Chicago.

Allow extra travel time.
